content: moopsy materials worsted weight yarn in white size e hook yarn needle fiberfill 12mm safety eyes small amount black yarn for embroidering the mouth bobble a bobble is like making 5 double crochets and attaching them all together *yarn over yo insert your hook through the stitch and draw up a loop yo and pull through two loops on your hook repeat from * four more times for a total of five stitches then yo and pull through all the loops on your hook your next single_crochet should be pulled very tight to help the bobble pop out directions moopsy is crocheted in the round at the end of each round do not use a slip_stitch but continue stitching onto the next available stitch if you d like you can use a stitch marker to hold your place moopsy is also crocheted without sewing you will be adding the ears feet and tail as we go instead of sewing them on afterward 6sc in magic_ring 6 increase around 12 single_crochet increase around 18 2sc increase around 24 3sc increase around 30 4sc increase around 36 single_crochet around for two row 36 on this row we will crochet the ears *16sc then chain 2 2tr slip_stitch in the front loops only of the next stitch repeat for a second stitch to make the second portion of the ear/antennae repeat from * to complete the second half of the round single_crochet around 36 single_crochet decrease single_crochet two stitches together around 24 single_crochet increase around 36 pause here to attach the safety eyes and embroider a small w for a mouth copyright 2023 jenni frencham you may sell items you make with this pattern you may not sell this pattern on your own site leave this copyright information in place in this row we will create the front feet these are made by stitching bobbles you may wish to adjust the spacing to make sure the bobbles line up nicely on the bottom side of your moopsy 5sc bobble 6sc bobble 23 single_crochet 36 single_crochet around for six row 36 this is the row where we make the back feet again feel free to adjust if the feet aren t lining up to your liking 5sc bobble 6sc bobble 23 single_crochet 36 4sc decrease around 30 3sc decrease around 24 2sc decrease around 18 stuff moopsy make sure to stuff the face to give it a nice round shape if you d like you can add some dried beans or plastic pellets or similar to the body to give it weight like a beanie baby in this row we will make the tail as with the feet please adjust the location of the bobble so that it works for your moopsy decrease six times bobble single_crochet decrease twice more and finish off 9 using the tail of your yarn sew through the loops of the last row and cinch them tight then tuck the yarn inside the body copyright 2023 jenni frencham you
